```{r}
library(dplyr)

readr::read_rds(here::here("content", "data", "wordcloud_data.rds")) |>
  slice_head(n = 100) |>
  mutate(
    text = Wort,
    size = 16 + 24 * (n - min(n)) / (max(n - min(n))),
    rotate = sample(
      c(-90, 0, 90),
      size = n(),
      replace = TRUE,
      prob = c(1, 2, 1)
    ),
    color = sample(
      rcartocolor::carto_pal(7, "BluYl")[3:7],
      size = n(),
      replace = TRUE
    ),
    .keep = "none"
  ) |>
  nd.util::d3_wordcloud(.element_id = "nd-18321312") |>
  as.character() |>
  nd.util::render_raw_html()
```
